definitions.body: :Ps 77:9 utterance, speech, word, only poet., & Jos 24:27 exalted style;—abs. ´[[א]] Job 22:28 + 5 t.; sf. [[אִמְרוֹ]] Job 20:29; Pl. abs. [[אֲמָרִים]] Pr 19:7 Pr 22:21; cstr. [[אִמְרֵי]] Nu 24:4 +; [[אֲמָרָיו]] Job 22:22; [[אִמְרֵיכֶם]] Job 32:14, Is 41:26 (on deriv. fr. [[אׂמֶר]] cf. Di Job 15:33) etc.;—

utterance, word, esp. pl. Job 6:26 (‖[[מִלִּים]]) Job 32:12, Job 32:14 (‖[[מִלִּין]]) Job 33:3, Job 34:37; Ps 5:2 (‖[[הָגִיג]]), Ps 141:6 (on this v. cf. Che); Pr 2:1 (‖[[מִחְוָה]]), v:Pr 2:16, Pr 4:10, Pr 4:20 (‖[[דָּבָר]]), Pr 7:1 (‖[[מִחְוָה]]), v:Pr 7:5, Pr 19:7, Is 41:26; words of God Nu 24:4, Nu 24:16 cf. Jos 24:27, Job 6:10, Job 22:22, Ps 107:11; fig. of day Ps 19:3 (sing.); cf. v:Ps 19:4 (‖[[דְּבָרִים]]) but vid. Che on v.; of wisdom (personif.) Pr 1:21 (‖[[קוֹל]]); oft. in phrase [[אִמְרֵי־פִי]] De 32:1, Ps 19:15 (‖[[הֶגְיוֹן]]); Ps 54:4 (‖[[תְּפִלָּה]]); Ps 78:1 (‖[[תּוֹרָה]]); Pr 4:5, Pr 5:7, Pr 7:24, Pr 8:8; cf. Job 8:2, Pr 6:2, Pr 6:2; of ´[[י]] Job 23:12 (‖[[מִחְוַת שְׂפתָיו]]); Ps 138:4; Ho 6:5 (of Yahweh's words as weapon); in phrases [[אִמְרֵיישֶׁר]] Job 6:25; [[בִינׇה]] ´[[א]] Pr 1:2; [[נׁעַם]] ´[[א]] Pr 15:26, Pr 16:24; [[דָ֫עַת]] ´[[א]] Pr 19:27, Pr 23:12; [[אֱמֶת]] ´[[א]] Pr 22:21, cf. [[הֵשִׁיב אֲמָרִים אֱמֶת]] v:Pr 22:21 return answer; [[תָּשִׁיב אֲמָרֶיהָ לָהּ]] Ju Jdg 5:29 she returneth (i.e. repeateth) her words to herself; ´[[חָשַׁךְ א]] spare (i.e. refrain fr.) words Pr 17:27.

sg. promise Ps 77:9; appointment, decree Job 20:29; command Ps 68:12 (but v. Che); plan, purpose Job 22:28 ´[[גׇּוַד־ א]]; Hb Hab 3:9 Thes sworn are the rods of appointment (i.e. the chastisements decreed), but passage dub., v. Comm.;— Ge 49:21 rd. [[אֲמִרֵי]] cf. [[אָמִיד]]; vid. Di.
